Set.Help: All military naval units receive +1 [ICON_MOVES] movement and +1 sight. Provides a free Lighthouse in the city in which it is built.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must be built on the coast.{building_great_lighthouse_location}
Provides 1 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person Point (GPP) towards a Great Engineer.{building_stonehenge_location}
1 Free Technology. Provides a free Library in the city in which it is built. Contains 2 slots for Great Works of Writing.{building_great_library_location}
Requires Liberty. Tile improvement construction speed increased by 25% and two Workers appear near the City.{building_pyramid_location}

Gains an additional trade route slot and a Cargo Ship appears in the city. Trade routes other players make to a city with the Colossus will generate an extra 2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for the city owner and the trade route owner gains an additional 1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for the trade route. City must be built on the coast.{building_colossus_location}
1 Free Social Policy.{building_oracle_location}
Requires Tradition. Provides a free Garden in the city in which it is built.{building_hanging_garden_location}

Enemy land Units must expend 1 extra [ICON_MOVES] movement per Tile inside your territory. Provides Walls for free in the city in which it is built. Upon discovering Dynamite, The Great Wall becomes obsolete.{building_great_wall_location}
[ICON_CULTURE] Culture and [ICON_GOLD] Gold costs of acquiring new tiles reduced by 25% in every city.{building_angkor_wat_location}
A free Great Prophet appears. Provides a free Temple in the city in which it is built.{building_hagia_sophia_location}
Requires Liberty. Tile improvement construction speed increased by 25% and two Workers appear near the City.{building_chichen_itza_location}
+25% [ICON_GOLD] Gold from [ICON_CONNECTED] Trade Routes.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must be built within 2 tiles of a Mountain that is inside your territory.{building_machu_pichu_location}
Provides 1 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person Point (GPP) towards a Great Merchant.{building_notre_dame_location}
Requires Rationalism. A Great Scientist appears near the City where the Wonder was built. 50% more [ICON_RESEARCH] Science generated from Research Agreements.{building_porcelain_tower_location}
+15% [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength for units fighting in friendly territory. Provides a free Castle in the city in which it is built.{building_himeji_castle_location}
+25% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in all Cities. Contains 2 slots for Great Works of Art.{building_sistine_chapel_location}
Requires Order. +50% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building Armor Units. 1 Free Social Policy.{building_kremlin_location}
Requires Patronage. Grants 2 additional Delegates in the World Congress. -10% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens in non-occupied Cities.{building_forbidden_palace_location}
The empire enters a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.{building_taj_mahal_location}
Requires Commerce. Cost of [ICON_GOLD] Gold purchasing in all cities reduced by 15%.{building_big_ben_location}
Requires Exploration. 1 free Great Artist appears near the City where the Wonder was built. Contains 4 slots for Great Works of Art.{building_louvre_location}
A Great General appears near the City where the Wonder was built and +15 XP for all Units built in this City.{building_brandenburg_gate_location}
Requires Freedom. +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Specialists in every city. 1 Free Social Policy.{building_statue_of_liberty_location}
[ICON_CULTURE] Culture cost of adopting new Policies reduced by 10%.{building_cristo_redentor_location}
In addition to its [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture effects, the Eiffel Tower also provides +12 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism.{building_eiffel_tower_location}
[ICON_GOLD] Gold cost of upgrading military units reduced by 33%.{building_pentagon_location}
1 Free Social Policy and +50% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in this city. Contains 2 slots for Great Works of Music. Must be constructed in a coastal city.{building_sydney_opera_house_location}
Requires Honor. All units gain +15% [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength when attacking cities.{building_statue_zeus_location}
+10% [ICON_FOOD] Growth in all cities. +15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building ranged units.{building_temple_artemis_location}

Gain 100 [ICON_GOLD] Gold each time a Great Person is expended. Each source of [ICON_RES_MARBLE] Marble or [ICON_RES_STONE] Stone worked by this City produces +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.{building_mausoleum_halicarnassus_location}

All newly-trained non-air Units in this City receive the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Drill I[ENDCOLOR] Promotion, improving [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength when fighting in [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]ROUGH[ENDCOLOR] Terrain. Provides a free Castle in the city in which it is built. Boosts city [ICON_CULTURE] Culture output by 20%.{building_alhambra_location}
Provides a free Broadcast Tower in all cities. +1 [ICON_CITIZEN] Population in each city and +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness per city.{building_cn_tower_location}

2 free Great Scientists appear near the City where the Wonder was built. Provides a free Spaceship Factory in the city in which it is built. +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building Spaceship Parts.{building_hubble_location}
+25% generation of [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People in all Cities. A free Great Person of your choice appears near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.{building_leaning_tower_location}
All Missionaries born in this city can spread religion three times. Provides a free Mosque in the city in which it is built.{building_mosque_of_djenne_location}

+3 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from every Castle.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must be built within 2 tiles of a Mountain that is inside your territory.{building_neuschwanstein_location}

+1 [ICON_FOOD] Food, +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for all desert tiles worked by this city (except Flood Plains). Gains an additional trade route slot and a Caravan appears in the city. +6 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture once Archaeology is discovered. City must be built on or next to Desert.{building_petra_location}
Creates a copy of each type of military land unit you control and places the unit near the city where the Terracotta Army is constructed.{building_terracotta_army_location}

99.9% reduction in effectiveness of enemy spies in the city in which it is built. All other cities in the civilization get a 25% reduction in enemy spy effectiveness.{building_great_firewall_location}
Requires Aesthetics. 1 free Great Artist appears near the City where the Wonder was built. Contains 3 slots for Great Works of Art.{building_uffizi_location}
1 free Great Writer appears near the City where the Wonder was built. Contains 2 slots for Great Works of Writing.{building_globe_theater_location}
1 free Great Musician appears near the City where the Wonder was built. Contains 3 slots for Great Works of Music.{building_broadway_location}
Defensive Buildings in all Cities are 25% more effective.{building_red_fort_location}

Requires Autocracy. In addition to the +2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness, the Prora Resort also provides +1 more [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for every 2 Policies you have adopted. 1 Free Social Policy. Must be constructed in a coastal city.{building_prora_resort_location}
Must be built in a Holy City. 3 free Missionaries appear.{building_borobudur_location}
Contains a prebuilt Great Work of Art in the Great Work Slot.{building_parthenon_location}

+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Scientists, and +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science from Engineers. Great Scientists provide 33% more [ICON_RESEARCH] Science when used to discover new technology. May only be built collaboratively through the World Congress.{building_international_space_station_location}
